## `SetStippleImage` {#batch-setstippleimage}

Sets the image to be used for custom brushes.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
SetStippleImage(string imagePath)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
`string` imagePath | The filepath to the image to be used for custom brushes.
